name.japanese: ゴーイング・メリー号

description: The Straw Hat Pirates' first ship, a caravel gifted by Kaya. In this episode, it becomes the site of Noko's memory theft attack.

keyEvents.title: Memory Theft on the Going Merry
keyEvents.description: Noko uses hypnotic music to steal the memories of all sleeping crew members aboard the Going Merry, causing chaos and confusion when they wake up.
keyEvents.significance: The ship becomes the site of the central conflict of the Ocean's Dream Arc as the crew loses their memories and begins to scatter.

keyEvents.title: Crew Wakes Up Confused on the Merry
keyEvents.description: The Straw Hat crew wakes up on the Going Merry with no memory of the ship, each other, or how they got there.
keyEvents.significance: The Going Merry, normally a symbol of their unity and home, becomes an unfamiliar and frightening place to the memory-less crew.

keyEvents.title: Nami Steals from the Going Merry
keyEvents.description: Nami, not recognizing the ship or crew, steals treasure from the Going Merry before fleeing on a waver.
keyEvents.significance: Shows the breakdown of trust and bonds as Nami treats the Merry like any other pirate ship to be robbed.

statusHistory.reason: The ship is operational and serves as the Straw Hats' home, though the crew doesn't recognize it
